summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1623, for the improvement of alley in Block Twenty-one (21), C. D. Boren's A. A. Denny's and H. L. Yesler's Addition to the Town (now City) of Seattle being the alley between Third Avenue and Fourth Avenue, from Madison Street to Madison Street, by grading and paving the same with vitrified brick, laid upon a proper foundation, including sewers, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17210 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
